label: ranker
description:
Rank
This is a count of the rows from top to bottom.
It is recalculated following the sorting of a column.

label: nationality
description:
Nationality of the player.
First, we check our records in international play at senior level.
Then youth level.
Then citizenship presented on wikipedia.
Finally, we use their birthplace when available.

label: position
description:
Position
Position most commonly played by the player
GK - Goalkeepers
DF - Defenders
MF - Midfielders
FW - Forwards
FB - Fullbacks
LB - Left Backs
RB - Right Backs
CB - Center Backs
DM - Defensive Midfielders
CM - Central Midfielders
LM - Left Midfielders
RM - Right Midfielders
WM - Wide Midfielders
LW - Left Wingers
RW - Right Wingers
AM - Attacking Midfielders

label: age
description:
Current age
Age at season start
Given on August 1 for winter leagues
and February 1 for summer leagues.

label: birth_year
description: Year of birth

label: games
description:
Matches Played
Matches Played by the player or squad

label: games_starts
description: Game or games started by player

label: minutes
description: Minutes

label: minutes_90s
description:
90s Played
90s played
Minutes played divided by 90

label: goals
description:
Goals
Goals scored or allowed

label: assists
description:
Assists
Assists

label: goals_assists
description:
Goals + Assists
Goals and Assists

label: goals_pens
description:
Non-Penalty Goals
Non-Penalty Goals

label: pens_made
description:
Penalty Kicks Made
Penalty Kicks Made

label: pens_att
description:
Penalty Kicks Attempted
Penalty Kicks Attempted

label: cards_yellow
description:
Yellow Cards
Yellow Cards

label: cards_red
description:
Red Cards
Red Cards

label: xg
description:
Expected Goals
xG totals include penalty kicks, but do not include penalty shootouts (unless otherwise noted).
Provided by Opta.
An underline indicates there is a match that is missing data, but will be updated when available.

label: npxg
description:
Non-Penalty xG
Non-Penalty Expected Goals
Provided by Opta.
An underline indicates there is a match that is missing data, but will be updated when available.

label: xg_assist
description:
Expected Assisted Goals
xG which follows a pass that assists a shot
Provided by Opta.
An underline indicates there is a match that is missing data, but will be updated when available.

label: npxg_xg_assist
description:
npxG + xAG
Non-Penalty Expected Goals plus Assisted Goals
xG totals include penalty kicks, but do not include penalty shootouts (unless otherwise noted).
Provided by Opta.
An underline indicates there is a match that is missing data, but will be updated when available.
Minimum 30 minutes played per squad game to qualify as a leader

label: progressive_carries
description:
Progressive Carries
Carries that move the ball towards the opponent's goal line at least 10 yards from its furthest point in the last six passes, or any carry into the penalty area. Excludes carries which end in the defending 50% of the pitch

label: progressive_passes
description:
Progressive Passes
Progressive Passes
Completed passes that move the ball towards the opponent's goal line at least 10 yards from its furthest point in the last six passes, or any completed pass into the penalty area. Excludes passes from the defending 40% of the pitch

label: progressive_passes_received
description:
Progressive Passes Rec
Progressive Passes Received
Completed passes that move the ball towards the opponent's goal line at least 10 yards from its furthest point in the last six passes, or any completed pass into the penalty area. Excludes passes from the defending 40% of the pitch

label: goals_per90
description:
Goals/90
Goals Scored per 90 minutes
Minimum 30 minutes played per squad game to qualify as a leader

label: assists_per90
description:
Assists/90
Assists per 90 minutes
Minimum 30 minutes played per squad game to qualify as a leader

label: goals_assists_per90
description:
Goals + Assists/90
Goals and Assists per 90 minutes
Minimum 30 minutes played per squad game to qualify as a leader

label: goals_pens_per90
description:
Non-Penalty Goals/90
Goals minus Penalty Kicks made per 90 minutes
Minimum 30 minutes played per squad game to qualify as a leader

label: goals_assists_pens_per90
description:
Non-Penalty Goals + Assists/90
Goals plus Assists minus Penalty Kicks made per 90 minutes
Minimum 30 minutes played per squad game to qualify as a leader

label: xg_per90
description:
xG/90
Expected Goals per 90 minutes
xG totals include penalty kicks, but do not include penalty shootouts (unless otherwise noted).
Provided by Opta.
An underline indicates there is a match that is missing data, but will be updated when available.
Minimum 30 minutes played per squad game to qualify as a leader

label: xg_assist_per90
description:
xAG/90
Expected Assisted Goals per 90 minutes
Provided by Opta.
An underline indicates there is a match that is missing data, but will be updated when available.
Minimum 30 minutes played per squad game to qualify as a leader

label: xg_xg_assist_per90
description:
xG + xAG/90
Expected Goals plus Assisted Goals per 90 minutes
xG totals include penalty kicks, but do not include penalty shootouts (unless otherwise noted).
Provided by Opta.
An underline indicates there is a match that is missing data, but will be updated when available.
Minimum 30 minutes played per squad game to qualify as a leader

label: npxg_per90
description:
npxG/90
Non-Penalty Expected Goals per 90 minutes
Provided by Opta.
An underline indicates there is a match that is missing data, but will be updated when available.
Minimum 30 minutes played per squad game to qualify as a leader

label: npxg_xg_assist_per90
description:
npxG + xAG
Non-Penalty Expected Goals plus Assisted Goals per 90 minutes
Provided by Opta.
An underline indicates there is a match that is missing data, but will be updated when available.
Minimum 30 minutes played per squad game to qualify as a leader
